<div class="content-wrapper">
  <h2>Welcome to Aquatic Sciences</h2>
  <p class="section-lead">
    Limnology sits at the intersection of hydrology, aquatic chemistry, ecology, and environmental policy. This course develops your ability to think across those fields simultaneously — because you cannot understand a lake or a river by looking at its biology alone, or its chemistry alone, or its physics alone. Each week pairs a 90-minute core lecture with a 30-minute hands-on data science module, building your skills as a data-literate freshwater scientist.
  </p>
